page.title: 03FARMING.
page.content: The director of a local arable farm told us that the farm is ten thousand five hundred acres yet employs only 35 full time workers, plus up to 60 seasonal casual workers.The computerised farm office has a manager and 7 secretaries.The computer keeps records aids decision making invoicing and payments.Winter wheat, barley, oil_seed rape,peas,potatoes and fruit are grown.Some crops are transported to other parts of the country but potatoes are sold to a local merchant Some peas are sold locally for home freezing and the fruit is a pick your own crop. Pests and disease are contolled by spraying from a helecopter and by good husbandry. About membership of the E.E.C.the farmer said"The idea is good basically because it tries to give all farmers a good living but it's hard to be fair".
